txt_en: Where you stumble and fall, there you will find gold.
txt_cn: 你在哪里跌倒，就会在哪里找到金子。
author: Joseph Campbell

txt_en: Soon is not as good as now.
txt_cn: 别谈未来，现在就行动。
author: Seth Godin

txt_en: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.
txt_cn: 善良的心就如一口快乐的喷泉，让附近的一切都充满欢笑。
author: Washington Irving

txt_en: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
txt_cn: 自律是连接目标与成功的桥梁。
author: Jim Rohn

txt_en: Not being heard is no reason for silence.
txt_cn: 没有被听见不是沉默的理由。
author: Victor Hugo

txt_en: Winning isn't everything, but wanting it is.
txt_cn: 胜利并不能代表一切，而求胜心可以。
author: Arnold Palmer

txt_en: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
txt_cn: 我没有失败，我只是找到了10000种行不通的方法。
author: Thomas Edison

txt_en: Never look back unless you are planning to go that way.
txt_cn: 永远不要回头，除非你想走回头路。
author: Henry David Thoreau

txt_en: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
txt_cn: 在创造性表达和知识中唤醒快乐，是教师的最高艺术。
author: Albert Einstein

txt_en: We ran as if to meet the moon.
txt_cn: 我们奔跑着，像去约见月亮。
author: Robert Frost

txt_en: The key to winning is poise under stress.
txt_cn: 获胜的关键是在压力下依旧保持镇静。
author: Paul Brown

txt_en: How you think when you lose determines how long it will be until you win.
txt_cn: 成为输家时的想法决定了你何时才能取得胜利。
author: Gilbert Chesterton

txt_en: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
txt_cn: 最困难的是下定决心去做，剩下的只是坚持而已。
author: Amelia Earhart

txt_en: The courage to imagine the otherwise is our greatest resource, adding color and suspense to all our life.
txt_cn: 敢有不同想像的勇气，是我们最大的资产，它使我们的人生增添色彩、充满悬念。
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

txt_en: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
txt_cn: 比起失败，怀疑自己会扼杀更多的梦想。
author: Suzy Kassem

txt_en: A single day is enough to make us a little larger or, another time, a little smaller.
txt_cn: 一天的时间足以使我们强大一些，也可以使我们弱小一些。
author: Paul Klee

txt_en: All my life through, the new sights of Nature made me rejoice like a child.
txt_cn: 在我的一生中，大自然中的新景象使我像孩子般快乐。
author: Marie Curie

txt_en: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
txt_cn: 快乐的人会让他人也感到快乐。
author: Anne Frank

txt_en: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
txt_cn: 失败可能会让你失望，但若不去尝试，就必定会失败。
author: Beverly Sills

txt_en: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
txt_cn: 准备是成功的关键，这比其他任何事情都重要。
author: Alexander Graham Bell

txt_en: People who live the most fulfilling lives are the ones who are always rejoicing at what they have.
txt_cn: 永远对所拥有的一切感到欣喜的人，是生活最富足的人。
author: Richard Carlson

txt_en: Dream big and dare to fail.
txt_cn: 敢于梦想，不畏失败。
author: Norman Vaughan
